description: A Mattermost plugin to receive and handle Rollbar webhook events
name: Matterbar

settings.help_text: The default team where Rollbar webhooks will be posted. If not configured, incoming requests must include a `team` query parameter.

The default channel where Rollbar webhooks will be posted. If not configured, incoming requests must include a `channel` query parameter. To use this setting, a default team must also be configured first.
(Required) The user that this plugin will post as.
A generated secret that must be included in the `auth` query parameter to authorize incoming requests.
settings.regenerate_help_text: Caution! Regenerating the auth secret will invalidate any existing integrations' requests.
